name: Unicorn Name Generator
description: Sparkle and shine with a name as unique and magical as you are! Our Unicorn Name Generator conjures up dazzling monikers fit for royalty (or at least, a very important unicorn).
introduction: Ready to ditch the mundane and embrace the mythical? This isn't just a name generator; it's a portal to a world of rainbows, glitter, and names so enchanting, they'll make you believe in magic. Whether you're crafting a character, naming your pet, or simply seeking a touch of whimsy, you've come to the right place. Prepare to be dazzled!
howToUse: Hold onto your horn! This is easier than catching a shooting star.
Simply click the 'Generate' button and watch the magic unfold.
Don't like the first result? Keep clicking! We've got a whole herd of unicorn names waiting to be discovered.
Feeling fancy? Tweak the prefixes and suffixes to create a truly bespoke, one-of-a-kind unicorn name.
Share your magnificent creation with the world! (Or keep it a secret, just for you... we won't tell.)

faqs.question: Is this generator really free?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our unicorn magic is freely given. No hidden costs, no secret spells required. Just pure, unadulterated name-generating joy.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: You bet! Once a name is generated, it's yours to use as you see fit. Write a book, start a business, name your racehorse... the possibilities are as endless as a rainbow.

faqs.question: Are the names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! The names generated are completely original and free from copyright. Create with confidence!

faqs.question: How many names can I generate?
faqs.answer: As many as your heart desires! Our generator is tireless. Generate until you find the *perfect* unicorn name.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Don't despair! Keep hitting that 'Generate' button. With countless combinations, you're bound to find a name that resonates with your inner unicorn. You can also try adjusting the prefixes and suffixes to create something truly unique.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! While we don't have a direct submission form, feel free to contact us with your suggestions. We're always looking for ways to make our generator even more magical.
